name: Kaiju Arena
description:
Play a Kaiju in this isometric arena brawler, and battle for supremacy. Your opponent will have to be a friend locally.

Creators:

Artist: E Von K

Programmer: Hawtori

How to play:

Player 1:

WASD to move 

1 to headbutt (close range attack)

2 to shoot laser beam (long range attack)

R to block (takes reduced damage)

Player 2:

IJKL to move

7 to headbutt (close range attack)

8 to shoot laser beam (long range attack)

P to block (takes reduced damage)

Each attack (or block) uses some amount of stamina. Running out of stamina means you are unable to cast attacks or blocks until you have sufficient stamina. Gain stamina back by not casting anything for a while.

Updates:
